name: anything-llm
description: Turn anything into a chattable document through a simple UI
author: Timothy Carambat (Mintplex Labs)

scripts.lint: cd server && yarn lint && cd .. && cd frontend && yarn lint
scripts.setup: cd server && yarn && cd ../frontend && yarn && cd .. && yarn setup:envs && echo "Please run yarn dev:server and yarn dev:frontend in separate terminal tabs."
scripts.setup:envs:
cp -n ./server/.env.example ./server/.env.development && cp -n ./collector/.env.example ./collector/.env && cp -n ./docker/.env.example ./docker/.env && echo "All ENV files copied!
"
